title: Veil of Deception
description: Morgan Lafayette returns, but this time she is missing her faithful sidekick Tilson. The fey at Zea Island have fallen victim to a mysterious illness, and now Morgan has to travel even further than she had ever expected to find a cure and save her friends. From the bottom of the ocean to a magical land above the treetops, Morgan faces more danger - and more adventure - than ever before.
author: Shanon L. Mayer
